title: Reliable differentiation of necrosis and active metabolically contours of glioblastoma multiforme using susceptibility-based imaging
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Anita Ebrahimpour, Mehdi Khoobi, Nader Riyahi Alam, Mahboubeh Masoumbeigi, Fatemeh Tirgar, Tayyebeh Ebrahimi
